name: weak-armor
effect: Whenever a physical move hits this Pok√©mon, its Speed rises one stage and its Defense falls one stage. This ability triggers on every hit of a multiple-hit move.
short_effect: Raises Speed and lowers Defense by one stage each upon being hit by a physical move.

flavor_text.x_y: Physical attacks lower its Defense stat and raise its Speed stat.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Physical attacks lower its Defense stat and raise its Speed stat.
